Class Calendar

java.lang.Object
edu.sc.csce747.MeetingPlanner.Calendar
public class Calendar extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Calendar()
    Default constructor, builds a calendar and initializes each day to an empty list.

  • Constructor Details

    • Calendar

      public Calendar()
      Default constructor, builds a calendar and initializes each day to an empty list.

  • Method Details

    • isBusy

      public boolean isBusy(int month, int day, int start, int end) throws TimeConflictException
      Used to check whether a meeting is scheduled during a particular time frame.
      Parameters:
      month - - The month of the meeting (1-12)
      day - - The day of the meeting (1-31)
      start - - The time the meeting starts (0-23)
      end - - The time the meeting ends (0-23)
      Returns:
      boolean - Whether the calendar has an entry in that timeframe.
      Throws:
      TimeConflictException - If an invalid date or time is entered.

    • checkTimes

      public static void checkTimes(int mMonth, int mDay, int mStart, int mEnd) throws TimeConflictException
      Basic error checking on numbers.
      Parameters:
      mMonth - - The month of the meeting (1-12)
      mDay - - The day of the meeting (1-31)
      mStart - - The time the meeting starts (0-23)
      mEnd - - The time the meeting ends (0-23)
      Throws:
      TimeConflictException - - If an invalid date or time is entered.

    • addMeeting

      public void addMeeting(Meeting toAdd) throws TimeConflictException
      Used to add a meeting to a calendar
      Parameters:
      toAdd - - A Meeting object to add to the calendar
      Throws:
      TimeConflictException - - If an invalid date or time is entered.

    • clearSchedule

      public void clearSchedule(int month, int day)
      Clears all meetings for a day.
      Parameters:
      month - - The month of the meeting (1-12)
      day - - The day of the meeting (1-31)

    • printAgenda

      public String printAgenda(int month)
      Used to print the calendar for a month in string form.
      Parameters:
      month - - The month of the meeting (1-12)
      Returns:
      String - The agenda as a formatted string.

    • printAgenda

      public String printAgenda(int month, int day)
      Used to print the calendar for a day in string form.
      Parameters:
      month - - The month of the meeting (1-12)
      day - - The day of the meeting (1-31)
      Returns:
      String - The agenda as a formatted string.

    • getMeeting

      public Meeting getMeeting(int month, int day, int index)
      Retrieves a meeting from the calendar.
      Parameters:
      month - - The month of the meeting (1-12)
      day - - The day of the meeting (1-31)
      index - - The index in the list for the meeting

    • removeMeeting

      public void removeMeeting(int month, int day, int index)
      Removes a meeting from the calendar.
      Parameters:
      month - - The month of the meeting (1-12)
      day - - The day of the meeting (1-31)
      index - - The index in the list for the meeting
